text: Læa nı hmu mnusʹy nan mi phu klaw wa rea sraththa tx xallxhˌ khran meux khea thuk tharay nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ khea k thux xeakar thdsxb khxng mnusʹy prahnung kar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxhˌ læa meux kar chwyhelux cak phracea khxng cea ma thung nænxn phwk khea ca klaw wa thæcring rea ca rwm kab phwk than læa mi chı xallxhˌ pen phuthrng ru di ying nı sing thi mi xyu nı hawxk khxng prachachati thanghlay dxk hrux
